meanings.sent1: The shirt was dried after being in the sun.
meanings.sent2: The dried towel hung on the rack.
meanings.sent3: The dried socks felt like crunchy crackers.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as dried as an old leaf.
meanings.sent5: The dried leaves crumbled at the touch.

meanings.sent1: The dried fruits were sweet and chewy.
meanings.sent2: She used dried herbs to season the soup.
meanings.sent3: The dried meat looked like colorful confetti.
meanings.sent4: His humor was as dried as jerky.
meanings.sent5: The dried flowers held memories of summer.

meanings.sent2: Her skin felt dry and dried in the desert heat.
meanings.sent3: The dried lips were in need of some lip balm.
meanings.sent4: His voice sounded as dried as sandpaper.
meanings.sent5: The dried fruit was a wrinkled delight.
